Thanks to the #TaxCutsandJobsAct millions of hard working Americans are earning higher wages! #TaxDay https://t.co/MBhThLCCES
Thanks to the #TaxCutsandJobsAct the child tax credit will be doubled! #TaxDay https://t.co/Vh8JcRzpmf
It’s #TaxDay ! Thanks to the #TaxCutsandJobsAct families will keep more of their hard-earned money https://t.co/JUE0wgsIWw
1 day until #TaxDay! Thanks to the #TaxCutsandJobsAct, businesses will pay historically lower rates so they can reinvest into their companies, create jobs and give their workers a pay raise!
2 days until #TaxDay! Thanks to the #TaxCutsandJobsAct, middle income families will pay lower rates, keep more of their hard-earned money and file under a simpler tax code.

4 days until #TaxDay! Thanks to the #TaxCutsandJobsAct,
we are leveling the playing field for hardworking families by reducing special
interest tax breaks & loopholes.
5 days until #TaxDay! Thanks to the #TaxCutsandJobsAct, American families will benefit from expanded eligibility and a doubling of the child tax credit to $2,000.
6 days until #TaxDay! Thanks to the #TaxCutsandJobsAct, American businesses will no longer pay the highest rate in the industrialized world.
7 days until #TaxDay! Thanks to the #TaxCutsandJobsAct, most Americans will be able to stop itemizing because of doubled standard deductions to $12,000 for individuals and $24,000 for families.

8 days until #TaxDay! Thanks to the #TaxCutsandJobsAct, #OpportunityZones will help more Americans succeed. 
https://t.co/BKvXXrOLqb
